name: dominaria
description: Dominaria-sized theme pack: historic (artifacts, legendaries, Sagas), kicker/multikicker, legendary sorceries, Knights/Wizards/Saprolings, and classic Dominaria-flavored effects.

Instant: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's legendary, it gains vigilance until end of turn.
Exile target tapped creature.
Tap up to two target creatures. Scry 1.
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If you cast this spell during your main phase, those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.
Kicker {KICKER_COST}. Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. If this spell was kicked, create two of those tokens instead.
Counter target spell that targets a creature you control.
Return target Aura or Equipment card from your graveyard to your hand.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. {HISTORIC_REMINDER} If it's historic, scry 1.
Sorcery: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. If you control a legendary creature, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance instead.
Exile target artifact or enchantment.
Legendary Sorcery — You may cast this spell only if you control a legendary creature. Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.
Kicker {KICKER_COST}. Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance. If this spell was kicked, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
Return target creature card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If it’s legendary, it gains lifelink until end of turn.
Enchantment: Whenever you cast a historic spell, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. {HISTORIC_RULES}
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control a legendary creature, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

Saga (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I — Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token. II — Creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn. III — Exile target tapped creature an opponent controls.
Creatures you control have vigilance as long as you control a legendary permanent.
Artifact: Whenever you cast a historic spell, you gain 1 life. {HISTORIC_RULES}
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast legendary spells.
{T}: Target legendary creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance. Equip {EQUIP_COST}. If equipped creature is legendary, equip {LEGENDARY_EQUIP_COST} instead.
Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Whenever you cast a historic spell, attach {THIS} to target creature you control. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
AuraCreature: Enchant creature. Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has vigilance. When {THIS} enters the battlefield, if enchanted creature is legendary, scry 2.
Enchant creature. Kicker {KICKER_COST}. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. When {THIS} enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
AuraLand: Enchant land. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {W}{W}. If you control a legendary creature, add {W}{W}{W} instead."
Activated: {W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
{2}{W}: Exile target attacking creature that dealt damage to you this turn.
Creature: Kicker {KICKER_COST}. When {THIS} enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
As long as you control another legendary creature, {THIS} has lifelink.
Whenever you cast a historic spell, put a +1/+1 counter on {THIS}. {HISTORIC_RULES}

Instant: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. If that spell is historic, counter it unless its controller pays {4} instead.
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you control a legendary creature, scry 1.
Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you control a Wizard.
Tap up to two target creatures. They don't untap during their controller's next untap step.
Kicker {KICKER_COST}. Counter target spell. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.
Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn. If it's legendary, draw a card.
Sorcery: Draw two cards. If you control a historic permanent, draw three cards instead. {HISTORIC_RULES}
Kicker {KICKER_COST}. Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands. If this spell was kicked, create a 1/1 blue Wizard creature token.

Legendary Sorcery — You may cast this spell only if you control a legendary creature. Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Enchantment: Whenever you cast an instant, sorcery, or historic spell, scry 1. {HISTORIC_RULES}

Saga (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I, II — Draw a card, then discard a card. III — Create a 2/2 blue Wizard creature token with "{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card."
As long as you control a legendary creature, creatures you control have "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw a card."
Artifact: {T}: Add {C}. Whenever you cast a historic spell, untap {THIS}. {HISTORIC_RULES}
{2}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate only if you control a Wizard or legendary creature.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has "{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card." Equip {EQUIP_COST}. If equipped creature is a Wizard, it also has hexproof.
AuraCreature: Enchant creature. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying. Whenever you cast a historic spell, untap enchanted creature.
Enchant creature. Kicker {KICKER_COST}. When {THIS} enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, draw two cards.
AuraLand: Enchant land. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {U}{U}." Whenever you cast a historic spell, you may untap enchanted land.
Activated: {U}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
{2}{U}: Return target historic permanent you control to its owner's hand. {HISTORIC_RULES}
Creature: Kicker {KICKER_COST}. When {THIS} enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, return up to one target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
As long as you control another Wizard, {THIS} has "When this creature enters the battlefield, scry 2."
Whenever you cast a historic spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

Instant: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. If it's legendary, you gain 2 life.
Destroy target nonlegendary creature.
Kicker {KICKER_COST}. Target player discards two cards. If this spell was kicked, you gain 2 life.
Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 black Cleric creature token.
Sorcery: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If it’s historic, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped instead. {HISTORIC_RULES}
Legendary Sorcery — You may cast this spell only if you control a legendary creature. Destroy target creature. You gain life equal to its toughness.
Kicker {KICKER_COST}. Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. If this spell was kicked, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a legendary creature, each opponent sacrifices a nonland permanent instead.
Enchantment: Whenever a creature you control dies, if it was legendary, return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

Saga (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I — Target opponent discards two cards. II — Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life. III — Return up to one target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Artifact: Whenever you cast a historic spell, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {HISTORIC_RULES}
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card." Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Equipped creature gets +3/+1. Equip legendary {LEGENDARY_EQUIP_COST}. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
AuraCreature: Enchant creature. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch.
Enchant creature. When {THIS} enters the battlefield, target player discards a card. If enchanted creature is legendary, that player discards two cards instead.
AuraLand: Enchant land. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {B}{B}." When enchanted land becomes tapped, you lose 1 life.
Activated: {2}{B}: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. If that creature is legendary, it gets -3/-3 until end of turn instead.
Creature: Kicker {KICKER_COST}. When {THIS} enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, target opponent discards two cards.
Whenever you cast a historic spell, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {HISTORIC_RULES}
When {THIS} dies, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

Instant: {THIS} deals 3 damage to any target. If you control a Wizard, you may have it deal 4 damage instead.
Kicker {KICKER_COST}. {THIS} deals 2 damage to each of up to two targets. If this spell was kicked, it deals 3 damage to each of them instead.
Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. Draw a card if that creature is legendary.
Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. If it’s historic, you may choose new targets for the copy. {HISTORIC_RULES}
Sorcery: {THIS} deals 4 damage to target creature. If you control an artifact or Goblin, {THIS} deals 5 damage to that creature instead.
Kicker {KICKER_COST}. Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens. If this spell was kicked, create four of those tokens instead.
Legendary Sorcery — You may cast this spell only if you control a legendary creature. Exile the top five cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
Enchantment: Whenever you cast a historic spell, {THIS} deals 1 damage to any target. {HISTORIC_RULES}

Saga (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I — Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens. II — Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. III — {THIS} deals 3 damage to any target.
Artifact: {T}: Add {R}. Whenever you cast a legendary spell, add an additional {R}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact or Goblin: {THIS} deals 2 damage to any target.
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has haste. Equip {EQUIP_COST}. If equipped creature is legendary, it also has first strike.
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 for each historic permanent you control. {HISTORIC_RULES} Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
AuraCreature: Enchant creature. Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has menace. When {THIS} enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.
Enchant creature. Kicker {KICKER_COST}. Enchanted creature gets +3/+0. When {THIS} enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create a Treasure token.
AuraLand: Enchant land. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add {R}{R}." When enchanted land becomes tapped, {THIS} deals 1 damage to you.
Activated: {1}{R}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
Creature: Kicker {KICKER_COST}. When {THIS} enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, it deals 2 damage to any target.
Whenever you cast a historic spell, {THIS} gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {HISTORIC_RULES}
As long as you control a Wizard, {THIS} has "{T}: {THIS} deals 1 damage to any target."

Instant: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If it’s legendary, it also gains trample until end of turn.
Kicker {KICKER_COST}. Target creature you control fights target creature you don’t control. If this spell was kicked, put a +1/+1 counter on your creature before it fights.
Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. If you control a legendary creature, you may put that card onto the battlefield tapped instead.
Sorcery: Create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens. Kicker {KICKER_COST}. If this spell was kicked, create four of those tokens instead.
Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures. If you control a legendary permanent, those creatures gain trample until end of turn.
Legendary Sorcery — You may cast this spell only if you control a legendary creature. Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Enchantment: Creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you control a legendary permanent.

Saga (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I — Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token. II — Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. III — Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
Artifact: {T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary permanents you control.
Whenever you cast a historic spell, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. {HISTORIC_RULES}
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. Whenever you cast a historic spell, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
AuraCreature: Enchant creature. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample.

Enchant creature. Kicker {KICKER_COST}. Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. When {THIS} enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
AuraLand: Enchant land. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color." If you control a legendary creature, enchanted land has "{T}: Add three mana of any one color" instead.
Activated: {G}: Target creature you control gains hexproof until end of turn.
{2}{G}: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
Creature: Kicker {KICKER_COST}. When {THIS} enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
Whenever you cast a historic spell, put a +1/+1 counter on {THIS}. {HISTORIC_RULES}
{THIS} gets +1/+1 for each legendary permanent you control.

Instant: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast historic spells. {HISTORIC_RULES}
Kicker {KICKER_COST}. Create a Treasure token. If this spell was kicked, create two of those tokens instead.
Sorcery: Search your library for a historic card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. {HISTORIC_RULES}
Enchantment: Historic spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. {HISTORIC_RULES}
Saga (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.) I, II — Scry 2. III — You may cast a historic spell from your hand without paying its mana cost.
Artifact: Legendary spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. If you spend this mana to cast a historic spell, scry 1. {HISTORIC_RULES}
Whenever a Saga you control gains a lore counter, draw a card, then discard a card.
Equipment: Legendary Equipment — Equipped creature gets +3/+3. Equip legendary {LEGENDARY_EQUIP_COST}. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
Equipped creature gets +1/+0 for each Saga you control. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
AuraCreature: Enchant legendary creature. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has hexproof from the colors of permanents you control.
AuraLand: Enchant land. Enchanted land is legendary and has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
Activated: {3}, {T}: Add {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}. Spend this mana only to cast historic spells. {HISTORIC_RULES}
Creature: As long as you control a Saga, {THIS} has vigilance and gets +1/+1.
Kicker {KICKER_COST}. When {THIS} enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Instant: Kicker {KICKER_COST}. Draw a card. If this spell was kicked, draw two cards instead.
{THIS} deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker. If it's legendary, you may have {THIS} deal 3 damage instead.
Sorcery: Multikicker {MULTIKICKER_COST}. Create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token for each time this spell was kicked.
Enchantment: Whenever you cast a historic spell, scry 1. {HISTORIC_RULES}
Artifact: {T}: Add {C}. Historic spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. {HISTORIC_RULES}
Equipment: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Whenever you cast a historic spell, you may attach {THIS} to target creature you control. Equip {EQUIP_COST}.
AuraCreature: Enchant creature. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Whenever you cast a historic spell, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature. {HISTORIC_RULES}
AuraLand: Enchant land. Enchanted land has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
Creature: Kicker {KICKER_COST}. When {THIS} enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, draw a card.

HISTORIC_REMINDER: (A historic spell is an artifact, a legendary permanent, or a Saga.)
